It's an e-sports game so of course its going to have a high level of polish despite being quite old now.

Those good old days, when the game hadn't 90% of its active population cheaters werereally good, but i guess that was just to be expected. Afterall it's Valve ...
Here we have a game with some dogshit tick rate on its own official servers, hit register couldve been better but u can get used to it (aim above head ofc ..... dosghit)
Then there's its community, most of which are a bunch of russian alcoholics screaming into the microphone in their goddamn dogshit language how they are gonna fuck your mother and how they fucked yours siter last night (yeah, nostalgia)

Cs had its own time, now people are playing it out of boredom and ofcourse because its free and new people are down to try it out (worst mistake of their lives besides beign born), which is okay, but its deffinitely time to move on and to bring a new game under the dwvelopment of someone else that this fatass richboi Gaben.

In general, play this game at your own risk of losing your mind. I deffinitely don't recommend playing this game at all.
